010-12419-02.globalProductName: Brushed Stainless Steel Watch Band (fēnix® Chronos)

seo.title: Brushed Stainless Steel Watch Band | Garmin
seo.ogDescription: This premium stainless steel link bracelet design combines fashion-forward styling with high strength and durability to meet the rugged environmental demands of outdoor navigation and multisport training.

overviewTab.title: Overview
overviewTab.content: This premium stainless steel link bracelet design combines fashion-forward styling with high strength and durability to meet the rugged environmental demands of outdoor navigation and multisport training. The band features 95 solid metal links – all forged of 316L stainless steel; then carefully assembled and hand-brushed to ensure a smooth, consistent texture. Handsome and lightweight, the band is supremely comfortable on the wrist, yet rugged enough for the most extreme activities. The fold-over clasp provides maximum security, requiring both pushbuttons to be engaged before the latch will release and open. Better still, the included spring bar attachment allows for easy band replacement on your fēnix Chronos with no tools.
